business.headline: Budget 2025: Why financial services sector needs a 'digital lending' boostBudget 2025 would play a key role in driving the country's economic growth through enhanced credit access to the rural and underserved sectors of the economy.

TCS, Wipro, Infosys: Why IT stocks rose today despite high market volatilityIT Stocks: TCS shares were up 3.04% to Rs 4,158.45 at 3:00 pm, Wipro gained 3.37% to trade at Rs 308.40, and Infosys jumped 3.11% to Rs 1,856.70.

HDFC Bank Q3 results: Net profit rises 2.2% to Rs 16,736 croreThe private lender reported a 7.6% increase in interest earned, which came to Rs 76,007 crore compared to Rs 70,583 in the same quarter of the previous financial year.

Explained: Why ICICI Prudential shares tumbled 10% after Q3 resultsICICI Prudential share price: The company's share price decline came a day after Q3FY25 results, where it reported a 43% rise in net profit to Rs 326 crore.

Zomato shares down over 23% in a month. Should you buy or avoid?Zomato share price: The food delivery giant's stock price has fallen over 14% in the previous two sessions and over 23% in the past month.

Check latest GMPDenta Water and Infra Solutions IPO: The price band for the IPO of Denta Water has been set at Rs 279-294 per share with retail investors required to invest a minimum of Rs 14,700. The minimum lot size for an application is 50.

Sensex, Nifty open higher driven by a rally in IT sector stocks; Wipro gains 2%The S&P BSE Sensex was up 246.41 points to 76,084.77, while the NSE Nifty50 added 62.15 points to 23,086.80 as of 9:26 AM.

HDFC Bank to announce Q3 results today: Here's what to expectHDFC Bank Q3 FY25 Results Expectations: Investors will be keeping a keen eye on the results as the stock of HDFC Bank has fallen 8.62% in the last month.

Budget 2025: Raghuram Rajan says tax cuts won't solve India's fiscal problemsFormer RBI Governor Raghuram Rajan said that he is not worried about the reduction in tax rates but instead about the need for more effective government spending, particularly in human capital development.

Stocks to watch today: HCLTech, HDFC Bank, HUL, Tata Communication, ZomatoHDFC Bank, Hindustan Unilever (HUL), and Tata Communication will be announcing their Q3 FY25 results today, hence their stocks will likely see some action.

Ex-RBI Governor Raghuram Rajan speaks on Trump's tariffs, job creation and othersFormer RBI Governor Raghuram Rajan highlighted his views on issues like US President Donald Trump's plans to impose tariffs on some countries, including India, and how the economy and job creation is progressing under the Narendra Modi-led central government.

Concern for world, won't benefit US much: Raghuram Rajan on Trump tariff threatSpeaking to India Today TV, former RBI Governor Raghuram Rajan warned that US President Donald Trump's tariff plans could harm global economic stability, increase costs, and deter foreign investment.

What to expect from Budget 2025: Growth, taxes, and fiscal realities in numbersFY25's deficit is projected at 4.9 per cent of the GDP, or Rs 16.1 trillion. Despite slower economic growth, the government is expected to stick to its fiscal discipline plan.

IMF's Gita Gopinath on Trump tariffs, impact on global growth, AI and moreDuring the interview, Gita Gopinath discussed the potential impact of US President Donald Trump's plan to impose new trade tariffs, global growth, bilateral trade between India and America, cryptocurrency and more.

IMF's Gita Gopinath suggests India to lower tariffs and focus on domestic reformsGita Gopinath suggested that India should consider lowering its tariffs, not only to counter the tariff concerns raised by former US President Donald Trump, but also to boost its own economic growth.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: CBI can, not state: Agency opposes Bengal's plea against life term in RG Kar caseThe Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) on Wednesday opposed the West Bengal government's appeal before the Calcutta High Court against the life imprisonment sentence to Sanjay Roy, who was convicted of the rape and murder of a trainee doctor at RG Kar hospital in Kolkata last year.

Saif hugs auto driver who took him to hospital, mother Sharmila blesses himSaif Ali Khan met the auto driver who took him to the hospital following the knife attack on January 16. The actor's mother, Sharmila Tagore, thanked him.

Chaos in lives of Indians on H-1B, L1 visas, their children in US. Here's whyThe lives of thousands of Indians and their families in the US on work visas like L1 and H-1B are going to witness a big change. As President Donald Trump orders cancellation of birthright citizenship, the children of Indians on work permits and in Green Card queues are going to be hit. Either they have to self-deport, or take up visas.

Trump's threat fuelling Trudeau's trouble? Survey says Canadians want polls nowWhile Donald Trump is busy signing executive orders, one of which threatened a 25% tariff on goods from Canada, pressure might be mounting for Justin Trudeau as a poll revealed that most Canadians want an immediate federal election.

Paatal Lok is a stunner, and a rarity that gets Nagaland and Nagas rightBy weaving Nagaland's cultural nuances and history into a gripping narrative, Prime Video series Pataal Lok Season 2, achieves a rare first. It shatters stereotypes and avoids the northeast exoticism trap. With breathtaking visuals and sensitive storytelling, Paatal Lok Season 2 has set a benchmark for mainstream portrayals of the northeast region of India.

Ben Shelton defeated Lorenzo Sonego and advanced to the semi-final of the hard court major. Earlier, Iga Swiatek sealed her spot in the semi-final after a thumping win over Emma Navarro in the quarter-final and Madison Keys completed a comeback win over Elina Svitolina.

Who is Shivon Zilis, Elon Musk's 'mystery partner' spotted at Trump's dinner?Elon Musk was accompanied by his 'mystery partner' at the pre-inauguration dinner of Donald Trump, making many wonder if he was making his relationship official with her. The woman is Shivon Zilis who shares three children with him.

Pataudi family may lose property worth Rs 15,000 crore after court orderOn December 13, 2024, the Madhya Pradesh High Court asked the Pataudi family to present their side before the appellate authority in 30 days. As of January 21, however, it was not clear whether the family did so.

Video: Car crashes through wall, falls from first floor parking of Pune apartmentThe car fell from the first-floor parking area after the driver accidentally engaged the reverse gear, losing control of the vehicle.

Top court's split verdict for Delhi riots accused bail plea for poll campaigningThe Supreme Court on Wednesday pronounced a split verdict on the petition filed by Delhi riots case accused Tahir Hussain seeking interim bail to campaign for the Delhi Assembly elections.

We need great people to come to US: Trump weighs in on H-1B visa debateDonald Trump on H-1B visa: When asked about the H-1B visa debate at a press conference on Tuesday, President Trump said that "I like both sides of the argument, but I also like very competent people coming into our country, even if that involves them training and helping other people that may not have the qualifications they do".

'Meri haldi hai, jaane do': Bride-to-be dodges traffic challan with a smile. VideoAanchal Arora, the bride-to-be, was seen speaking to cops from her car after her driver was seemingly stopped for a traffic violation.

Saif Ali Khan wanted to meet, thank help for her bravery after returning home: SourcesActor Saif Ali Khan returned home from hospital following two surgeries days after the stabbing incident. Sources tell India Today that the actor wanted to meet and thank house help Eliyamma Phillip for her bravery.

BJP alleges Punjab employees installing Chinese CCTVs in Delhi, AAP hits backThe 70-member Delhi Assembly is scheduled to go to polls on February 5 and the results are set to be declared on February 8.

Trudeau warns Trump against imposing tariffs, says US needs Canadian resourcesShortly after taking office on Monday, US President Donald Trump reiterated his threat to impose a 25 per cent tariff on Canadian and Mexican imports, starting as early as February 1, if the two neighbouring nations did not clamp down on illegal immigration.

Mumbai musician vibes to Air India track on flight. Airline reacts to videoMumbai-based musician Paresh Kamath couldn't stop vibing to the Air India track on his flight. The video has gone viral on social media.

Donald Trump says he is okay with Elon Musk buying TikTok: Will the app return to India?President Donald Trump made a big announcement that he is okay with his billionaire supporter Elon Musk or Oracle Chairman Larry Ellison buying TikTok. But, he is not asking these tech leaders to buy this social media platform completely and is suggesting that somebody can buy it and give half to the United States of America.

Trump's Defence Secretary pick accused of abusing 2nd wifeRepublican leaders said they doubted the new allegations would change the votes of support they are lining up for Pete Hegseth. They marched ahead with the nomination on Tuesday evening, taking a key procedural step needed to confirm him by week's end.

This comes after the makers faced legal trouble for alleged damage to the forest.

Pics: AP Dhillon makes stylish debut at Paris Men's Fashion WeekSinger AP Dhillon recently attended Louis Vuitton's Paris Men's Fashion Week 2025. This is the first time an India-born Punjabi music artist attended Paris Men's Fashion Week.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.
